website_summaries.verdict: Affordable cat food is full of nutrients and fibers that help prevent hairballs.
pros: Food sits at a quality price point
Contains natural ingredients like chicken, salmon, and spinach
Rich in fiber to control hairballs
cons: Grains and corn account for much of the protein content

customer_reviews.title: New Formula - Be Sure to Check if Original or New
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this I did not realize this was a "new" formula, that there are now New and Original types of Purina Naturals. Unfortunately my cat does not like this new formula, and I also noticed that the kernels were larger than previous. I'm trying to mix this with the original to see if my cat will eat it, but so far she is separating out the old from the new. So just a heads up to consumers about this formula change. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: BTManzy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE this food.. I have two cats.. one in particular if a finicky eater, meaning she throws up a LOT, lol. This cat food really agrees with her sensitive stomach. I've tried many brands and types of cat foods.. even the more expensive food and she just pukes it up.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Grain-free cat food made with Chicken By-Product Meal...
customer_reviews.text: YES, this cat food is grain-free. YES, the main ingredient in this cat food is "chicken by-product meal" - something I was not aware of (nor happy about - Google it). YES, my cats will begrudgingly eat it. YES, it was a decent buy compared to Beyond grain-free. NO, I will not be buying it ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My cat was vomiting every day. I did research and found this to be the best for the money. Its been 4 weeks and he hasn't vomited once since i switched. He's happy with a healthy coat.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Tuck

customer_reviews.title: Picky cat loves this
customer_reviews.text: Picky cat loves this. The shelter were I adopted her starved her almost to death and I pleaded with her all day to eat. She just was not used to eating very much. Finally after all these years, she has found something she likes. She is still thin, but eating healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia C

customer_reviews.title: Made my cat sick
customer_reviews.text: From day one we could not figure out what was making our cat throw up. After the third night waking up to him vomiting everything he ate we took it away and he hasn't had a problem since. It would swell up in his tummy and he would just throw it back up but it would be double the volume he ate. I didn't realize I had bought grain free and from what we read this is a common problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Grain free is bad for pets
customer_reviews.text: Somehow I ordered the “grain free” version of this cat food and I did not mean to. As more and more people are learning, grain free pet food is suspected of causing heart problems in dogs and cats. The culprit in this cat food is two different forms of peas in the top five ingredients. Peas prevent your cat from being able to produce taurine, necessary for heart health, and can cause serious heart disease. Unfortunately the two versions of this cat food (regular and grain free) come in bags so similar it’s easy to confuse them, as I apparently did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for my sensitive tummy 14 year old!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried all of the fancy brands that are super expensive and contain ingredients like quail and sweet potatoes and my baby girl would always end up throwing them up. All three of my cats love this food and and Bailey has only thrown up a couple of time after eating it for several months now. I am very happy with the quality and really don’t believe a lot of the hype of the expensive brands. This is a really good price and my cats are doing better on it than they did on the $80 bags!
customer_reviews.author: vivereperamore

customer_reviews.title: Made our cat sick
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what it is about this batch, as we have been feeding our two cats the Grain Free stuff for a few years. We ordered online due to the pandemic, instead of grabbing at Petsmart like we usually do, and one cat has been puking it up once per day if not multiple times in a row, in addition to yellow bile. The other has puked a few times (she rarely ever pukes). Will not ever order cat food from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: JDubs

customer_reviews.title: my cat's best choice
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. My cat is rather picky, but really enjoys the brand/style of food. It isn't little pellets, so my cat can pick the pieces up easily and chew the food. It seems to have a natural crumble, and isn't packed too tightly. My kitty has tried some of the more expensive brands and doesn't seem to care for them as much as this.
customer_reviews.author: mike levin

customer_reviews.title: New formula bad for my cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat used to eat the older formula and liked it. The new formula with the larger pieces and slightly lower protein content makes her stool SOFT (I have to clean up the side of the litter box) and she threw up recently. I thought it might have been something else but seeing the food pieces in the throw-up made me realize its the new formula. Wish I could get a refund for such a large bag I won't be using.
customer_reviews.author: getsomesleep

customer_reviews.title: Only grain free my senior cat will eat
customer_reviews.text: My old man cat developed allergies to regular cat food so, over 2 years, I've tried many grain free foods. Even after mixing them with his Meow Mix, he wouldn't touch it and actually starved himself. Then, I got this. He hated it at first just like all the other ones, so I mixed his beloved Meow Mix into it. After 3 months, and gradually reducing the mix, he eats it greedily. We're at the last time mixing the two since, now, he leaves the Meow Mix in the bowl. I don't have to worry so much about his allergies now, and, it's the least expensive brand I've seen in grain free.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Jung

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for Better Food
customer_reviews.text: I would give this five stars if all of my cats would eat it but one will have none of it and he's been anorexic so can't push the issue with him. Otherwise it is a very good option if you have a tight budget but want a better food for your fur babies. One of my cats doesn't tolerate grain well so this is a big help to her. If her brother decides to get with the program and enjoy it with the others I will come back and give it a five. Thank you Purina for giving us an affordable option.
customer_reviews.author: BETSY SAWYERS

customer_reviews.title: Affordable grain-free, less puking, better poop
customer_reviews.text: My 2 cats were puking at least once every 2 weeks before I got this brand. Grain-free makes a huge difference and this one is affordable. Also (this is prob TMI) they have better poop (more substance, less frequent but still daily, and less messy). I have an injury that makes it hard to get heavy items from the local store. I don't like asking my daughters to shop for me all the time. I love that I can get this delivered straight to my door and only need to ask my daughter to bring it in the house.
customer_reviews.author: MichelletheGeek

customer_reviews.title: I am not a cat
customer_reviews.text: The cat that runs my house seems to like this food. The dog that co-runs my house doesn't seem to care for it, which is a good thing. I really can't speak to the flavour or scent. The cat likes the taste, apparently, and she seems to respond to the rustle of the bag more than the scent. You'd really have to ask her. She's not on FaceBook, so I'm not sure how you'd reach her. She's pretty quiet, mostly. But she does let me know when her bowl is empty, and she seems quite happy when I re-fill her bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Ness

customer_reviews.title: Grain free inexpensive cat food
customer_reviews.text: #fosterfail Russell came to us overweight and rough for. I have found that cat food with no gluten helps with soft fur. Also, he doesn't have fireballs anymore. This cat food is a good value for a grain free food. Glad to have it delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Wildpiglet

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Love
customer_reviews.text: My kitty kats love this formula & since it says pet 'naturals' I feel good about feeding it to them. I've tried other expensive brands, without wheat, grains or added fillers and they they sniff it & look up at me as if to say 'this ain't what we like & you know that we is the boss, so Go Back To The Store!'
customer_reviews.author: VAB

customer_reviews.title: Kitty likes it
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if the food is the cause, but my kitty has stopped vomiting all over the house. Prior to switching to this grain free option, my kitty would vomit every other day for years. She didn’t have any health problems so I tried different foods and supplements that didn’t work. I started her on this food in July and she hasn’t vomited since. Update; I spoke too soon, hasn’t fixed her vomiting, but it has nothing to do with the food and I continue to purchase it. Outdoor neighborhood cats seem to love it too.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: This cat food is addictive
customer_reviews.text: We noticed with the very first bowl that our cat became obsessed with this food and before we knew it, she was overweight! We had to start rationing it. After some research, I concluded that Purina must have a "flavor additive" that makes it irresistible to some cats. If you are TRYING to put weight on your cat, buy this! If your cat has a weight problem, DON'T. Too bad since it is hard to find grain-free cat food.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bigbee

customer_reviews.title: Low quality cat food pay now or pay later
customer_reviews.text: this is one of the lowest quality cat foods on the market. I can see a marked difference in my cats' fur and overall appearance. I bought this to feed feral cats and i could see a change in their appearance. I switched over to the Costco brand cat food which is slightly better and way less expensive. I say you pay now in price for a bit higher food, or you pay later when your cat is in renal failure bc of this junk food.
customer_reviews.author: Joy V.

customer_reviews.title: They Pass The Cat Test
customer_reviews.text: My rescue cat was kept for an unknown time in an SPCA shelter where he was fed kibble. As a result he is extremely picky about canned foods, even the most expensive ones. However, he is not picky about any of the Purina Cat Chow dry foods and this one is a major hit with him. I give him both wet and dry food, but he likes variety a great deal and he seems to prosper physically with it. So, I say, if your kitty is not sure about the dry food you are presently offering him/her, try this.
customer_reviews.author: Perry M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: My cats favorite flavor
customer_reviews.text: My three cats love this flavors. All three are elderly and need to keep weight on. Their picky and this is their favorite. *The grain free flavor is hard to find in my area so I ordered on amazon. *It arrived boxed so it arrived sealed in perfect condition. *The food was fresh so no worries about stale product. *The price on Amazon ( currently about )18.99) is fair.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Not Purina?
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t think this is Purina. I’ve been feeding this brand to my kitty for a long time, and this is the first time I ordered it from amazon. It does not look like the food I normally buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Loves this and I see improvement in her 👍😀👍
customer_reviews.text: She goes crazy for this and her stomach and intestines like it. No diarrhea or pain. Do a 10 day mix gradual change with each day less if the old brand and not of this to get used to it or your cat will get cramps and diarrhea. In addition to this, we add warm water for fluids. She also gets grain free Fancy Feast half can 2X day with water for her skin and fur and helps keep hydrated. She's becoming playful, fur and skin is improving with daily brushing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Incubus-Nihilist

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: I have a half siamese cat with a sensitive stomach. No more throwing up. He does better on the grain free version. But for some reason in this covid issue, I cant get the grain free... ... ... He is one of 8 I have living out in the country. My other more healthier cats love it. Their coats are shiny and they act playful. They are very vocal when the food bowels are close to empty. If a cat comes to tell you I'm hungry fill up the bowel, then its a good product. They birds even eat the cat food.
customer_reviews.author: Jonzey

customer_reviews.title: Super Picky Cat
customer_reviews.text: While I honestly can't vouch for the flavor my cat Cali says "No, no, no!". We are switching from Purina Naturals Indoor cat food due to Purina changing the formula, which is now making Cali sick. Yes, I mixed her "old" food with this but she is turning her nose up at it. The issue may be that the size of the pellets are bigger. Maybe kitten food for her? From my viewpoint cats should love this and being no grain they should digest it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Boston

customer_reviews.title: Better Price Than In Stores
customer_reviews.text: My cat has been eating this brand for a few years now. Considering the current circumstances, I've been staying home and ordering more things online. I was looking for an inexpensive way to stick with my cat's normal no grain diet and brand. Much to my surprise, his Cat Chow is cheaper here than in the store! While I agree with other reviewers, the kibble is a smidge larger and thicker than the EXACT same product I've purchased from stores, my little guy still loves it. We're 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: msevao

customer_reviews.title: Taste preferred
customer_reviews.text: This works well with wet cat food as well. Be sure set out some after the cat has had wet cat food first. My cats are healthier digestive in that order. WET 9 Lives cat food first. 2nd dry cat food, ( but very little ) I portion the amount 4 times each day -( very little ) This gives the cat a chance to digest (than the food can be enjoyed not wasted)
customer_reviews.author: Lori Swaen

customer_reviews.title: Great price point for big bag.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I’ve always loved this brand. It’s the one my cats prefer. I’ve tried all the fancy stuff and my cats just won’t go. They like the cheap stuff apparently. Great size bag it last a very long time with my one cat. Now I have three so idk how long it will last now. I’ll probably order two bags next and hope it lasts long as well. My cats are also fatties. They free feed and they’re not overweight, they just love their food. I’ve had the bag for about a month now and it’s still a little more than half way full.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Padilla

customer_reviews.title: It’s a keeper
customer_reviews.text: My two cats like it. The bag comes with a sticker for when you roll the bag closed to stick to itself which is a nice attempt they have added as something extra. It would be SUPER cool if they made the bag resealable with a zip lock or something but that’s just my random wishful thinking. Not something that is going to stop me from buying this again. When it comes down to it: if the cats eat it and it sits well with their stomaches -I’m not switching. So we are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi J.B.

customer_reviews.title: no food coloring
customer_reviews.text: love the lack of food coloring. the colors have stained surfaces with other foods. cat loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Not good for cats
customer_reviews.text: ALL 4 cats have been on this for almost 1 months (bought 6/13 it's now 7/9) and the ALL have the runs. Our cats are 12 years, 7 years, 4 years and 2 years. They are from several different ares of VA (we do adoptions) and they ALL have had diarrhea for 2 days now. There has been NO change to lifestyle, diet, behavior, nothing. THIS is the only thing new introduced to them in 3 months. VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: atasteofcreole

customer_reviews.title: Orange's favorite
customer_reviews.text: Once I bought the version with grains and my cat refused to eat. This is his favorite, when he turned 9 months old, he turned away from can good. I tried other brands since he is turning into an adult cat, but for now this what he wants. I feel the all natural and grains free should be safer and will cause less health problems, I just need make sure he has fresh water to go without.
customer_reviews.author: MurphySlaw

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it but I ordered this size by mistake. I prefer the smaller package which fills the cat feeder for a week. Then I can open a fresh package. This size is OK but will take 4-6 wks to go through.
customer_reviews.author: SandiMacD

customer_reviews.title: Worked for the sensitive stomach of a Sphynx
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the sensitive system of our hairless cat. Worked wonderfully for him and our two domestic shorthairs. He didn’t even get sick transitioning over. Unlike other foods we’ve tried, our cats were happy to down this food. Must taste good to them because I can barely keep their bowls full. Tastes and worked better than many more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Lowe Family

customer_reviews.title: Want a dead cat? Buy this. Almost killed ours.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this food! According to my vet, this food caused an intestinal hairball blockage due to the lack of fiber and proper coat nutrients in my cat, almost killing her. We had been using other grain-free foods that Amazon suddenly did not carry and we switched to this food. HUGE MISTAKE! We barely saved her in time. Do not make our mistake. Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kecia Coffield

customer_reviews.title: Less Puking!
customer_reviews.text: My cats have eaten the original version of this food for many years, but I decided to give the grain free a try! Not only do they love it, but they puke a lot less now.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Flores

customer_reviews.title: This is the best cat food I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cat food I have ever used. I had been feeding our cat another name-brand food and our cat was losing weight very fast. I thought he was very ill and needed to been seen by a veterinarian. Before we went to that expense, I thought we should try different food to see if he would gain some weight. After only two weeks of using this food, we could see a noticeable difference. Within the next couple of months, our cat gained about ten pounds and his fur is now shiny and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: PJPTDP

customer_reviews.title: Makes my uber picky cat eat
customer_reviews.text: The flavor im supposed to rate the flavor ... um welllll no im going back to the cat food those days are over lol but my cat seems to love it turns out my cat actually has kidney failure though so i bought right before we found out so i mix this in to get her to eat her kidney food so it seem to pretty good she was piping up eating this right before we found out so i gives allllll the stars and now shes doing great
customer_reviews.author: Christiana

customer_reviews.title: My 3 love it.
customer_reviews.text: My cats must be on grain free as I've got 2 that throw up grain food. This one they love. I have 3 tabbys, indoor/ outdoor (indoor all winter). They can't get enough. I hated the smaller pellets of other foods as they make a mess of it. Buying here costs the same as Walmart but delivered to my door. Makes a difference when I live 35 miles away from Walmart and many times they are out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie E. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: cats dont like
customer_reviews.text: i just bought this one because the kind i usually get was out of stock. The cats don't like it and its hard to keep fresh because the bag sticks up even if you try to roll it down. Alot of these "naturl" brands re new and experimental compared to the tried nd true brands that have been around a long time
customer_reviews.author: Beth Dahmer

customer_reviews.title: My Maine Coon Loves This!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brand and grain free dry food that I give my Maine Coon cat for the past 3 years, and she loves it. I combine it with 2 squeezable puree treats to prevent hairballs and she has never been healthier. Usually I buy a smaller bag at the market, but tried ordering this larger size and it is a blessing! Lasts for a month. Arrived very fast and in perfect condition. Good deal for my budget also!
customer_reviews.author: Marlan Warren

customer_reviews.title: Only Dry Food My Finicky Cat Eats
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a good dry food without additives, grain, color that was still tasty enough and at a medium price point. I have even bought the $34+ foods online that are supposed to be the most nutritious and my cat would barely sniff the bowl. I try to add variety, but this is the one she likes.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B. Powell

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this grain-free foood
customer_reviews.text: If my cat could write this review, I believe she would rave. She is allergic to grains, so this is a good food for her. I've tried other grain-free dry foods, but this is the one she always eats happily. I was pleased at the easy-to-open bag. The food seems very fresh.
customer_reviews.author: C. McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it
customer_reviews.text: My cats vet recommended grain free cat food for my cats, but everything I found was either extremely expensive, or my cats wouldn't touch it. This is all my cats have been fed for the past 6 months, and they love it. My budget loves it, too. My cats seem to be doing great on it, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, grain free.
customer_reviews.text: I honestly think he liked it better before they took the grain out but I'm so glad they finally did. Good quality lower price range dry food, and he is adjusted and eating it fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Full of Bugs
customer_reviews.text: Bag came full of bugs from factory. Need to immediately check stock and protect further deliveries of this product. I had to throw out entire bag immediately. No way to know if it was the storage from (Walmart) or manufacturer Cat Chow for origination, but still contaminated my entire kitchen while I was at work. Want money back....
customer_reviews.author: Scully RN

customer_reviews.title: My sensitive kitty had a reaction to this food
customer_reviews.text: One out of our four cats has a grain sensitivity that gives him asthma flares so we tried this grain-free food. All of our cats really love it and things were going well until Mr. Sensitive Kitty broke out in a skin rash all over his body and began vomiting every night. Figuring it was the new food we switched back to Abound and the rash is clearing up and we've been able to sleep through the night once again. The other three cats seemed to have no problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: SteppyC

customer_reviews.title: Finicky cats will like it
customer_reviews.text: I own a very, very finicky cat who refuses to eat any food other than this. He loves the Purina Natural foods grain free or not. I fed him the original one for quite some time but it seemed to me that he got bored with it so I decided to try the grain free and it is a big hit in my home! He just cannot seem to get enough of it! Thanks Amazon for carrying this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Via A Baltus

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased this food because it was one of the cheaper options for grain free cat food. Since this whole virus thing I’ve tried to put my cat on a couple different foods since it was out of stock and so far I’ve had no luck. She is absolutely in love with this food, and gets excited every time the back rattles. I hope you don’t let some of the ingredients scare you it doesn’t matter what you think it just matters what your cat wants. And you know when it comes to humans as well we don’t always eat the healthiest. I myself give this food five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Abelseth

customer_reviews.title: My girls love this food!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time using Purina Naturals Grain free cat food (previously used the Purina Naturals original). My girls love it! I also like that the food pieces are a little bigger than other cat foods. This helps to slow down their eating because that have to chew it rather than swallowing it whole. I will definitely buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELE L. CREBS

customer_reviews.title: What a steal!
customer_reviews.text: My kitty loves her "space nuggets," but they do give her some nasty breath. I use a mouth cleaner gel to help freshen her up a bit. Much more cost effective to order through here than going to my local store.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats that vomit!
customer_reviews.text: After putting our cat through so many brands and vet visits, someone said, "Why don't you try grain free? Cats are meat eaters." Duh? First, the cats love the flavor as they come get me to fill their bowl every morning. We have had no mishaps EVER! great price especially adding to our monthly delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Tia G.

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this the most
customer_reviews.text: My cats like the original(they're old and no longer want science diet, premium brands) but after buying this they won't eat any other dry food
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it and i get to feel good about not pumping them full of wheat, corn, and dyes.
customer_reviews.author: BRITTNEY R.

customer_reviews.title: Happy cat
customer_reviews.text: When my cat learns to talk I’ll give you a more integrated review .
customer_reviews.author: Fodi

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: My cats are very picky and I have 3 of them. They actually enjoy eating these. I can tell that it's healthy because the cats are always energetic and they are not throwing up unless they eat too fast. Glad they offer the large bags!
customer_reviews.author: The S Family

customer_reviews.title: Huge difference for my cat !
customer_reviews.text: My picky cat that vomits easily actually likes it and no longer has any vomiting issues since she started eating this dry food. Normally she prefers wet food but started gravitating more to this kibble since I've started her on it.
customer_reviews.author: Petefish Petefish

customer_reviews.title: Purina is owned by toxic Nestle company
customer_reviews.text: My cat really likes this, but I saw (in really tiny print) that Purina is owned by Nestle. I cannot back them since they are a really bad company, especially with manipulating Flint and African countries' water issues and theyre now trying to drain Springs in florida. A toxic company to spend your dollar towards when there are other companies out there with better causes.
customer_reviews.author: dbeezy

customer_reviews.title: Cat eats it!
customer_reviews.text: Outdoor feral brat cat....real picky about what you put out for her, loves this stuff some much now she's fat...too fat to fit in her hole to her house...my fault, she only lets me pet her when I feed her...so I feed her too often :)
customer_reviews.author: kb

customer_reviews.title: Made my cat sick
customer_reviews.text: My cat started throwing up after eating every time he ate it took way too long to figure out that it was just the food and not an underlying health issue. Changed food and he's back to normal. Huge waste of money also concerning as to what is in the food.
customer_reviews.author: jlundin

customer_reviews.title: The only dry food my cat will eat!
customer_reviews.text: My cat refuses to eat any other dry food so as far as we’re concerned this is the absolute best cat food ever! It asks for stars regarding the flavor and honestly I have no idea except that he loves it. The smell is mild and not offensive.
customer_reviews.author: 11th Hour Mobile Notary

customer_reviews.title: Is this ACTUALLY Purina?
customer_reviews.text: Ok first, I'm not sure how I'm supposed to rate the flavor since I haven't personally dug in. My cat doesn't show great aversion so I assume that's a plus. What I'd like to know is, why on earth is the kibble larger and thicker than the EXACT same product I've purchased from stores? Is this really what you say it is? Color me skeptical...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cats come running.
customer_reviews.text: Cats eat it up like it is good! They go into a tizzy when the box arrives with their food inside. Then like velociraptors, as a group, they stalk their prey, the shipping box, to pounce on it so it cannot escape. Seriously, they know what is in the box and get so impatient while I open it. Cats love it!
customer_reviews.author: Domivel

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH VOMIT
customer_reviews.text: My cats really liked this formula for a couple years, but, for the past two months, none of my four cats can stomach this anymore. There was puke all over my house. Even the strays I feed didn’t like it. At first I thought it was just a bad batch, so I tried again, but no dice. Whenever I get a bag from Walmart, though, there aren’t any problems. What’s different about the food delivered from Amazon?
customer_reviews.author: Gilraen

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I don't follow the gimmick of kitten chow. Ducky the cat has been eating this cat food since he was 10 weeks old. He's just a short haired barn cat variety that weighs 20 pounds on a half cup of this food and nothing else for the past year. He won't touch people food and doesn't like cat treats either.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: We tried this food after a neighbor gave us an extra bag. We used it to see if one of our cars was having an allergic reaction to our current food, but after starting the second bag our other cat continuously emptied his entire day's meals. Neither of our cats have ever thrown up, especially like that. We're switching back to our normal food.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Amiotte

customer_reviews.title: Cats Love It
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 cats and they all love this food, so I assume the flavor is good. It doesn't have a strong scent which I also like. It's slightly expensive for a 13lb bag, but I know my cats are eating well with this food so it's worth it in my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Allison S

customer_reviews.title: Meow meow gimme more....
customer_reviews.text: I adopted 2 kitties from a foster mom who bought them a months supply of Rachael Ray Nourish and some other expensive cat food, which they ate, but didn't love, based on how long it took them to finish. They like this better!!!
customer_reviews.author: GeoGal

customer_reviews.title: There is something wrong with this food.
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats. All of them are now eating the dog food since I put this food in the feeder for them......None of them have been picky eaters before...........I want to send it back, but I cant.............
customer_reviews.author: tuufulhundin

customer_reviews.title: Great food for sensitive stomaches
customer_reviews.text: I cant buy the all meat food, but this comes close to them. My cat is sensitive to many foods but this one he thrives on.
customer_reviews.author: AK S

customer_reviews.title: Grain free, and good for kitty!!
customer_reviews.text: I had wanted to try a grain free food, and gave this a try. My cat seems to have more energy, and no more tummy problems. This is a keeper! It's good for him, and he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Kilroy

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Made my cats throw up & have hair all issues. Also made my cats skin dry & flaky. Although they like the taste I will have to go back up to more expensive brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Depp

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't really know about the flavor but I assume it's good cause my cat loves it!! Smells like cat food. Good price for what your getting.
customer_reviews.author: Mariasbeauty38

customer_reviews.title: Great for grain-sensitive cat tummys
customer_reviews.text: All of the grain-free pet food at pet stores is so expensive. This stuff is reasonably priced and my cat doesn't yack it up all over the house like she did with regular grain-based food, so you get a good product for sensitive kitties at a price that's not ridiculous. Great for people who love their fur-babies (and their disposable income). ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Cordroy

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: We.. its hard to evaluate flavor because I didn't eat it and "Scent" ....I asked the cat and she was too bashful to answer but she seems to like it so I'm guessing all of the above rate features are good. :)
customer_reviews.author: Cjw

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it, but questionable ingredients?
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this food and have been losing weight (they are both overweight). However, the ingredients are a little questionable.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Picky cat loves this cat food!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is a very picky eater and he loves this brand and type. I’ve tried different kinds and he likes this one. I give him this kind as his main meal.
customer_reviews.author: Immpluse

customer_reviews.title: Scent isn't offensive, cats are chowing down.
customer_reviews.text: They really seem to like it! I've fed them a variety of foods, and this one being chicken-based seems to be a hit. 10/10 gold ducks.
customer_reviews.author: John Tabor

customer_reviews.title: My Cats Like It
customer_reviews.text: This is a review ofPurina Cat Chow Naturals Grain-Free with Real Chicken Adult Dry Cat Food. My two cats eat this food and seem to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Lakes

customer_reviews.title: My cats like it.
customer_reviews.text: My cats actually like this brand, I was concern since they are very picky about their food, thankfully they like and they seem to enjoy. It's good enough.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ayala

customer_reviews.title: All is well
customer_reviews.text: It's funny that you ask the human about the flavor. I didn't taste it but my 4 cats love this product. It was delivered in a speedy fashion; thank you! Well packed too!
customer_reviews.author: linlou55

customer_reviews.title: Flavor good :
customer_reviews.text: Cat seems to like the flavor but the kernels appear to be larger and crunchier / louder and harder to chew than other brands. I could be totally wrong but I’m going back to trying another brand once I get through this huge bag!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diet Diva

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I have no clue how it tastes. But the critters liked it, so I gave it 5 stars. It is a bit expensive. Not just on Amazon, but everywhere. I can get a 30+ lbs bag of other brands for the same amount. However my babies need it, so I spend the $$ to make them healthy and happy.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Hann

customer_reviews.title: Blue buffalo on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Cats like it. Best quality and quantity for the money. I've looked at a ton of cat food ingredients. If you care about feeding your cats grain free food but want a reasonable price this is your best bet.
customer_reviews.author: Saspa

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Likes It
customer_reviews.text: Hard to rate the flavor, because I have not tried it and my cat remains silent when I ask him about it. I am left to assume he likes it, because he eats it as if it's quite gourmet. This is the first bag I have bought for him and I am mixing it with his kitten food (also purina grain free), as he is just a year old as of this month. I will be purchasing it again and until such time as he may indicate he would prefer a change.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Schlosser

customer_reviews.title: My Cats enjoy it. 😻
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 rescue cats and they seem to enjoy this. I do want to explore different flavors. This scent and flavor they like.
customer_reviews.author: 💜Southern Green Eyes 💜

customer_reviews.title: No More Tummy Issues!
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats who are constantly throwing up thier dry food even with hairball remedies. They were on Purina One but with this grain free all of those symptoms have drastically decreased.
customer_reviews.author: Barefootsoul

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I struggle to figure out what is the best grain-free dry food for my cats I give them mostly wet food. They hate this well but I always struggle to figure out which brand is the highest quality and I haven't figured that out yet
customer_reviews.author: tracy woods

customer_reviews.title: My fur babies like it
customer_reviews.text: I've got 2 large fur babies and they eat a lot buying cat food here is cheaper and easier than going to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger White

customer_reviews.title: Cat is sick on new formula
customer_reviews.text: Hi, this new formula did not agree with my cat. She is 2 years old, and today she ate this bag I purchased, and she threw up. She cannot eat this new formula. Need to return!
customer_reviews.author: Manda_Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good quality ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: Our feral cats seem to love this dry food and their coats have improved since we started them on Purina Naturals. We mix the grain free with the originals.
customer_reviews.author: Victor L. Stosik

customer_reviews.title: Cat likes it.
customer_reviews.text: My cat is picky and I wasn't sure if he would like the new cat food. He loves it and it is better for him. He wants me to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it & I love that it's grain free
customer_reviews.text: Decent value for the price, and I like being able to feed my cat grain free food. She also loves it. Will continue to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LARGE PURINA CAT FOOD GREAT VALUE AND EIL
customer_reviews.text: Kitty is very happy with her chow and our family is beyond grateful we do not have to lug that huge bag from the store. We will order again for sure. One thing I wish was dirrerent would be the ability to use manufacturer's coupons. Despite the fair price I'd like to have the ability to earn additional discounts via coupons.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Taylor Smalls

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE delivered right to my door!👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: WOW, I usually buy the normal size at the supermarket, but never again!!!! This GIANT BAG was delivered right to my door and it was cheaper than the supermarket...... ♥️🐈♥️
customer_reviews.author: Dee LaValle

customer_reviews.title: A good grain free food for the kitties
customer_reviews.text: I buy grain free food for my cats for their over all health. One of my cats is allergic to food with red dye it in, and this food is what I go food because none of the dye will upset my cat. They seem to love the food. One thing that could make this better is a bigger bag! lol I have 5 cats so its nice to get 20lbs of food at a time!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Johnson

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have four strong healthy indoor cats and this is their favorite food. Someties, I try something else, but they usually sniff it, then go away. They are always happy with this Purina Natural.
customer_reviews.author: M. Houdek

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say first hand how it tastes... but it must taste great, my cats eat it all up. My cat has knocked the container off the island in the kitchen so her & my other cat can have a feast
customer_reviews.author: Lbm_8744

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: my tabby cat is happy with this. I paid more than usual, but it was worthwhile to get it delivered to my door.
customer_reviews.author: R M

product_meta.title: Purina Cat Chow Naturals Grain-Free with Real Chicken Adult Dry Cat Food
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Chicken| Size:13 lb. BagWith a delicious taste cat's love and the nutrition they need, Purina Cat Chow Naturals Grain Free With Added Vitamins, Minerals & Nutrients adult dry cat food provides something both you and your cat companion can love. This grain-free adult cat formula provides her with all 25 essential vitamins and minerals to help support her overall health. This formula for adult cats is made with chicken as the first ingredient, so your cat gets the poultry flavor she craves. Also, this recipe is free from artificial colors, flavors and preservatives. Adjust the portion sizes as necessary to help her maintain an ideal body condition. With Cat Chow Naturals Grain Free, you know she's getting the quality ingredients cooked with care in the USA, so you can feel confident every time you fill her dish. Purina Cat Chow Naturals provides 100% complete and balanced nutrition for adult cats. Show your cat you care about giving her a natural meal she can savor with Purina Cat Chow Naturals Grain Free adult dry cat food.
feature_bullets: One (1) 13 lb. Bag - Purina Cat Chow Grain Free, Natural Dry Cat Food, Naturals With Real Chicken
No artificial colors, flavors or preservatives
High-quality protein to help support strong muscles
